attributes.action: Force Blackpool FC to stop charging away supporters more than their home supporters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blackpool FC have introduced a membership scheme which is only available to their own supporters. Anyone who tries to buy a ticket for the ground who is not a member will have to pay an extra £5.00 on top of already extortionate admission prices to sit, open to the elements, in a temporary structural grandstand.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
